result.execSummary:
The defendant Lydia R. GAUTHIER was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Heroin, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to the prison sentence presently being served on 13 CF 33 to commence upon defendant's discharge date after extended supervision ends.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Submit to random urine screens and pay for same.

Maintain absolute sobriety.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Provide DNA sample.

records.addlTxt: Plea date on April 7, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Defendant's Response to State's Discovery Demand.
Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant in custody on PO hold.
Defendant waives her right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.   
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed.  Not guilty plea entered.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 02-11-16 at 3:15 p.m. 
Minutes.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of possess heroin.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 01-25-16 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that she report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and maintain absoluate sobriety from drugs and alcohol.   Bail furnished and defendant is remanded into custody on a probation hold.
Minutes.
